Establishing Timeliness Controls on Potential Under/Overpayments
When information is received that suggests a potential under/overpayment may exist, add the
Potential Under/Overpayment
special issue to allow for monitoring of timeliness in completing action on potential under/overpayments.
Exception
:Â  The use of the
Potential Under/Overpayment
special issue is not required while processing pension and survivor claims.
